name: Lordian: Karma
description: Destroy waves of monsters with your powerful magic crossbow and alchemical traps. Freeze, blow, trample, even burn your enemies with various traps available. From extreme difficulty which can only be experienced through multiplayer to various stages of difficulties for single player.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790 CPU @ 3.60GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB Storage: 15 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4790 CPU @ 3.60GHz Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB Storage: 15 GB available space
